attributes.action: To enshrine in new legislation nature's right to exist and  to regenerate itself
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the country of Ecuador has in law the right of nature to exist and to regenerate itself so should we and the whole world in order to fight global warming if not too late 
the future is in our hands and its our responsibility only ....
act now!!
by giving nature a voice and a right to defend itself in court via us.
